--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Derek James" <djames@...> wrote:
>
> About a =
month ago someone on the Numenta forums posted an idea about
> modifying NE=
AT to optimize architectures for HTM (hierarchical 
temporal
> memory) syst=
ems, which are basically hierarchical Bayesian networks:
> 
> http://www.nu=
menta.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=3D422
> 
> Nobody responded, but I thought=
 you guys might be interested.

Derek, thanks for pointing that out; it's=
 an interesting suggestion.  
HyperNEAT might also be applicable to HTM's, =
which I'm guessing would 
benefit from some repeating motifs.

ken
